actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to delay for one year the application of certain restrictions contained in section 103 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to obligations issued under section 11(b) of the United States Housing Act of 1937.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to delay for one year, until July 1, 1985, the application of certain restrictions pertaining to tax-exempt obligations with respect to public housing obligations issued for low-income housing.

titles.title: A bill to delay for one year the application of certain restrictions contained in section 103 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to obligations issued under section 11(b) of the United States Housing Act of 1937.
